name: STAIRWAY TO HEAVEN (GHOST AUDIOVISUAL.)
description:
STAIRWAY TO HEAVEN

Is a game that follows the story of LUBRIEL, a young man according to the rejected for his past actions which after an emissary of death touched his home launches into the adventure of solving his problems with the important people of his life, accompanies him to see what his destiny is.

Please visit our other ambitious DIA project, and download its demo if you liked this adventure

Our native language is not English, so we apologize in case you find misspellings any errors can be reported in the comments

If you are a content creator, please leave a link in the comments, our team appreciates it

if you have the possibility to support us in PayPal, we would appreciate it, so you help us to continue making games and in a shorter time, because doing these things on a laptop with a celeron is horrible

PAYPAL account:

https://paypal.me/GHOSTAUDIOVISUAL?country.x=MX&locale.x=es_XC

with love, Isaí rodríguez.
